column5: Pearson Auto and Sport IncBox 486Lot 42 Highway 105Ear Falls,Ontario POV 1TO807-222-3425 That was from my invoice when they did the work.Bill
Is there a Yamaha repair shop / dealer anywhere near Ear Falls? Just in case......I'm just being pro-active before any problems that might haunt our trip. Thanks.Pooch
one in ear falls.one in red lake. two in kenora and two in dryden.
Had to go to the 1 in ear falls a couple years ago to get my impeller replaced on my T8 got me right in did a great job and was fair priced!!!!!
pearsons auto, on the corner where you turn toward the plaza
Bill, how is that new backtroller working out?
Pearson's should have you covered but if not, Lakeside Marine in Red Lake, Ask for Mike.
geomax & btmncr, familiar with Lakeside, but not Pearson's. Never needed either. Hoping to keep it that way! Thanks.Pooch

PoochI hit a rock in reverse last year while backing the boat off the sand shore on Windigo Point.I knocked teeth off two gears in the lower unit.Vance,the owner of Pearsons ,got me in right away.He called his father at home and had him come in and fix my motor that day. One other time I went in there and they had a prop I bought as a spare.I thought his prices were reasonable.Bill
